open.title: Vuma Villages Outage | Gauteng
open.description: Vumatel has informed us of a network outage affecting Gauteng, affected clients will experience no connectivity. Vumatel engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologise for any inconvenience caused.

updates.content:
23/11/2022 | 23:45 | Another impact was observed. Vumatel has mitigated the impact and we continue to monitor for any further impacts.

23/11/2022 | 18:11 | Vumatel has applied a change in an attempt to stabilise the connection for Afrihost clients on the Vuma Villages network. Unfortunately, this change was not successful and rolled back. 
We continue to work with Vumatel and partners to find a permanent solution to the ongoing issues experienced. We apologise for the inconvenience caused.

21/11/2022 | 20:48 | Another impact was observed and mitigated. We apologise for the inconvenience caused.

21/11/2022 | 19:08 | We are observing additional impact. We are engaging with Vumatel to mitigate the current impact. We apologise for the inconvenience caused.
